#summary Description of the framework

= Introduction =

Over time I have created this framework which helps you to easily setup a flash website. The framework makes use of SWFAddress for deeplinking and TweenLite for transitions. 

= Features =

These are the features of the framework
  * Global page creation + linking
  * Deeplinking enabled
  * Page class with overridable states
  * Navigation system
  * Global event system
  * Automatic Event removal system   
  * Transition between pages
  * Global page settings
   * Transition in/out between page
   * Easing/time customizable
   * Alignment options
  * Settings can be overrided on page level
  * Custom transitions are possible by implementing ITransition
